transcript:
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Ji bol rahe hain. Suniye aapke account manager se baat ho rahi hai meri.
Customer: Ji. Ji.
Executive: Ji Biyan ji baat kar raha tha sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Bataye sir aapka kuch concern hai regarding aapki baat hui thi aapke account manager se to aapne bola tha aap.
Customer: Ji haan. Ji haan. Abhi ye account hai na usme uska share holder kya bolte ho wo abhi hai nahi. To angle karta hai na wo abhi hai nahi.
Executive: Achcha wo wo nahi hai wo nahi hai. Aap nahi aap nahi dekhte?
Customer: Nahi wo main nahi dekhta. Haan.
Executive: Nahi main nahi dekhta.
Executive: Achcha to matlab isi number pe baat hogi ya ya fir dusre number 97201 wale pe baat hogi?
Customer: Ah usse bhi hogi usme bhi hogi.
Customer: Kahiye na jab aate ho tabhi aapse baat karunga main aapse baat karunga.
Executive: Theek hai kab tak aayenge wo koi idea hai sir?
Customer: Haan wo to abhi 6:00 baje aa jayenge aaj.
Executive: To 6:00 baje to hamara fir office over ho jayega na sir.
Customer: Aisa hai. Aap kal kijiye na. Kal subah 9:00 baje kijiye.
Executive: Theek hai to main kal kar deta hu hai na main aaj aapka unse.
Customer: Mera number bhi likh lo mera number bhi de dena mera jaise aayenge aap mera number likh lo chahe to.
Executive: Haan theek hai aapka bhi mera number likh lijiye unko jaise aayenge to wo de dena taki unko mil jaye unka matlab ticket maine band kar diya kal ka subah ka 10 baje ka meeting unke sath main rakh lunga.
Customer: Mera number likh lijiye.
Executive: Hmm boliye. Boliye.
Executive: Sir 78 ek aapki awaz cut ho rahi hai.
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: 78
Customer: 78
Executive: 74
Executive: Usse aage aage boliye. Boliye.
Executive: Aapki awaz cut ho rahi hai sunai nahi de raha hai. Main aapko whatsapp kar du is number pe fir apna number?
Customer: Haan ji haan whatsapp kar dijiye.
Executive: Whatsapp kar deta hu aapko fir hai na main isko concern close kar deta hu number whatsapp kar deta hu unko de dijiyega 10 baje kal fir main 11 baje 10 se 11 ke beech me aapko call bhi kar lunga. Theek hai?
Customer: Ji. Haan wo bhi hai wo abhi aapko baat karni hai wo 97 wala number hai na. Achcha usse baat ho jayegi ki 97 wale pe to main us pe kar leta hu. Haan aap usse baat kar lo.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's shareholder is currently unavailable.

- Wants to know which number to contact.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to call back tomorrow.

- Executive took customer's number to share.

- Suggested calling the 97 number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call between 10-11 AM tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- shareholder, call, contact, number

seller_categories.mcat_name: Personal Vibrators and Massagers for Women
Sex Toys For Men and Women
